channel.title: About on Zuozhi Wang
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zuozhi Wang

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a fifth year Computer Science PhD student at UC Irvine, under the supervision of Professor Chen Li. My research focuses are on the areas of distributed big data processing and query optimization. Research Interest Distributed Data Processing Data Management Query Optimization Publications In chronological order: Demonstration of Collaborative and Interactive Workflow-Based Data Analytics in Texera (demo paper) Xiaozhen Liu, Zuozhi Wang, Shengquan Ni, Sadeem Alsudais, Yicong Huang, Avinash Kumar, Chen Li, in VLDB 2022.
